name: Epic Jetpack Shonty man
description:
I think that Epic Jetpack Shonty man is one of the hardest platformer games in the world. You must blast your way through the monsters to save your village. This is a fast-paced 2d shooter/platformer. You should watch the trailer!!!

This game is developed by Sem van Birgelen (13 years old). "This is my first game and I hope you will enjoy it!!"

Watch out!!! This game is only windows compatible. So it won't work on MacBook.
